text: Benedict XIII (born Pedro Martínez de Luna y Pérez de Gotor; 1328–23 May 1423), known as el Papa Luna in Spanish, was an Aragonese nobleman who claimed to be Pope during the Western Schism. The Catholic Church officially considers him an antipope. Category:Spanish popes Category:1328 births Category:1423 deaths Category:People from Aragon Category:Antipopes
title: Antipope Benedict XIII
